mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inventory_items (id, name, description, available_quantity, category, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{availableQuantity}, #{category}, COALESCE(#{createdAt}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), COALESCE(#{updatedAt}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
mapper.update: UPDATE inventory_items SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, available_quantity = #{availableQuantity}, category = #{category}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM inventory_items WHERE id = #{id})
